Package edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.repository

Class InMemoryGameRepository

java.lang.Object
edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.repository.InMemoryGameRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameRepository
@Component public class InMemoryGameRepository extends Object implements GameRepository
Class that changes the model based on requests passed from client. Only directly game-related functions are handled here.

    • setTankSpawn

      public void setTankSpawn(int x, int y)
      USED FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY. Sets tank spawn to a specific cell.
      Parameters:
      x - Row for tank to spawn in
      y - Column for tank to spawn in.

    • join

      public Tank join(String ip)
      Adds a player to the current game. If there is no game occurring, it creates one.
      Specified by:
      join in interface GameRepository
      Parameters:
      ip - IP address of the player joining.
      Returns:
      Returns the Tank object for the tank added to the game.

    • getGrid

      public int[][] getGrid()
      Returns an integer array representation of the field grid. If there is no current game, it creates one.
      Specified by:
      getGrid in interface GameRepository
      Returns:
      An array representation of the field grid.

    • turn

      public boolean turn(long tankId, Direction direction) throws TankDoesNotExistException, IllegalTransitionException, LimitExceededException
      Checks constraints and turns a tank.
      Specified by:
      turn in interface GameRepository
      Parameters:
      tankId - Tank to be turned
      direction - Direction to turn the tank
      Returns:
      Returns false if constraints are violated. Returns true if turn is successful.
      Throws:
      TankDoesNotExistException - Throws if there is no thank corresponding to tankID.
      IllegalTransitionException - Throws if a tank tries to turn in an illegal manner.
      LimitExceededException - I honestly don't know on this one.

    • move

      public boolean move(long tankId, Direction direction) throws TankDoesNotExistException, IllegalTransitionException, LimitExceededException
      Checks constraints and moves a tank
      Specified by:
      move in interface GameRepository
      Parameters:
      tankId - Tank to be moved
      direction - direction to move tank in
      Returns:
      Returns false if constraints are violated. Returns true if move is successful.
      Throws:
      TankDoesNotExistException - Throws if there is no thank corresponding to tankID.
      IllegalTransitionException - I'm not sure here because this exception is specifically about turns.
      LimitExceededException - Don't know here

    • fire

      public boolean fire(long tankId, int bulletType) throws TankDoesNotExistException, LimitExceededException
      Checks constraints, fires bullet, then sets timer to move bullet.
      Specified by:
      fire in interface GameRepository
      Parameters:
      tankId - Tank to fire bullet from
      bulletType - Type of bullet to be fired.
      Returns:
      Returns true if bullet fired successfully. Returns false if constraint violated.
      Throws:
      TankDoesNotExistException - Throws if there is no thank corresponding to tankID.
      LimitExceededException - Don't know on this one
